questiontext.text:
[[lang code="de"]]

(a) Bestimmen Sie für

{@(B)@} = {@B1@}    und    \(b\) ={@b1@}

die Lösung des linearen Gleichungssystems

\( B\cdot x=b\).

Das Gleichungssystem besitzt

[[/lang]][[lang code="en"]]

(a) Choose for

{@(B)@} = {@B1@} and\(b\) ={@b1@}

the solution of the linear equation system

\( B\cdot x=b\).

The equation

[[/lang]][[input:ans1]][[lang code="de"]] [[/lang]][[lang code="en"]] [[/lang]][[validation:ans1]][[lang code="de"]][[/lang]][[lang code="en"]][[/lang]][[feedback:prt1]][[lang code="de"]]


(b) Bestimmen Sie für

{@(C)@} = {@C1@}    und    \(b\) ={@b1@}

die Lösung des linearen Gleichungssystems

\( C\cdot x= b\).

Das Gleichungssystem besitzt

[[/lang]][[lang code="en"]]


(b) Choose for

{@(C)@} = {@C1@} and\(b\) ={@b1@}

the solution of the linear equation system

\( C\cdot x= b\).

The equation

[[/lang]][[input:ans2]][[lang code="de"]] [[/lang]][[lang code="en"]] [[/lang]][[validation:ans2]][[lang code="de"]][[/lang]][[lang code="en"]][[/lang]][[feedback:prt2]][[lang code="de"]]


(c) Bestimmen Sie für

{@(D)@} = {@D1@}    und    \(b\) ={@b1@}

die Lösung des linearen Gleichungssystems

\( D\cdot x = b\).

Das Gleichungssystem besitzt

[[/lang]][[lang code="en"]]


(c) Choose for

{@(D)@} = {@D1@} and\(b\) ={@b1@}

the solution of the linear equation system

\( D\cdot x = b\).

The equation

[[/lang]][[input:ans3]][[lang code="de"]] [[/lang]][[lang code="en"]] [[/lang]][[validation:ans3]][[lang code="de"]][[/lang]][[lang code="en"]][[/lang]][[feedback:prt3]][[lang code="de"]]



[[/lang]][[lang code="en"]]



[[/lang]]

generalfeedback.text:
[[lang code="de"]]

Lösung


(a)

\(\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@A@} & {@B2@}& {@C2@} & 1\\ 4& 5 & 6 & 1 \\{@D2@} & {@E@} & {@F@} &2 \end{array}\right) \xrightarrow{{@A@}II-4I, {@A@}III-{@D2@}I}\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@A@} & {@B2@}& {@C2@} & 1\\ 0& {@5*A-B2*4@} & {@6*A-4*C2@} & {@A-4@} \\0& {@E*A-B2*D2@} & {@F*A-D2*C2@} & {@2*A-D2@} \end{array}\right)\xrightarrow{{@5*A-B2*4@}III-({@E*A-B2*D2@})II}\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@A@} & {@B2@}& {@C2@} & 1\\ 0& {@5*A-B2*4@} & {@6*A-4*C2@} & {@A-4@} \\0& 0 & {@(F*A-D2*C2)*(5*A-B2*4)-(E*A-B2*D2)*(6*A-4*C2)@} & {@(5*A-B2*4)*(2*A-D2)-(E*A-B2*D2)*(A-4)@} \end{array}\right)\)


Es gibt eine freie Variable (beispielsweise \(x_3\)).

Daraus folgt: Das LGS besitzt unendlich viele Lösungen.


(b)

\(\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@F@} & {@D2@}& {@C2@} & 1\\ 4& 5 & 6 & 1 \\{@B2@} & {@E@} & {@A@} &2 \end{array}\right) \xrightarrow{{@F@}II-4I, {@F@}III-{@B2@}I}\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@F@} & {@D2@}& {@C2@} & 1\\ 0& {@5*F-D2*4@} & {@6*F-4*C2@} & {@F-4@} \\0& {@E*F-D2*B2@} & {@F*A-B2*C2@} & {@2*F-B2@} \end{array}\right)\xrightarrow{{@5*F-D2*4@}III-({@E*F-B2*D2@})II}\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@F@} & {@D2@}& {@C2@} & 1\\ 0& {@5*F-D2*4@} & {@6*F-4*C2@} & {@F-4@} \\0& 0 & {@(F*A-B2*C2)*(5*F-D2*4)-(E*F-B2*D2)*(6*F-4*C2)@} & {@(5*F-D2*4)*(2*F-B2)-(E*F-B2*D2)*(F-4)@} \end{array}\right)\)

\(x_1,x_2,x_3\) können eindeutig bestimmt werden.

Daraus folgt: Das LGS besitzt genau eine Lösung.


(c)

\(\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@F3@} & {@E3@}& {@D3@} & 1\\ 6& 5 & 4 & 1 \\{@C3@} & {@B3@} & {@A3@} &2 \end{array}\right) \xrightarrow{{@F3@}II-6I, {@F3@}III-{@C3@}I}\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@F3@} & {@E3@}& {@D3@} & 1\\ 0& {@5*F3-E3*6@} & {@4*F3-6*D3@} & {@F3-6@} \\0& {@B3*F3-E3*C3@} & {@F3*A3-C3*D3@} & {@2*F3-C3@} \end{array}\right)\xrightarrow{{@5*F3-E3*6@}III-({@B3*F3-C3*E3@})II}\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@F3@} & {@E3@}& {@D3@} & 1\\ 0& {@5*F3-E3*6@} & {@4*F3-6*D3@} & {@F3-6@} \\0& 0 & {@(F3*A3-C3*D3)*(5*F3-E3*6)-(B3*F3-C3*E3)*(4*F3-6*D3)@} & {@(5*F3-E3*6)*(2*F3-C3)-(B3*F3-C3*E3)*(F3-6)@} \end{array}\right)\)


III: \(0x_1+0x_2+0x_3={@(5*F3-E3*6)*(2*F3-C3)-(B3*F3-C3*E3)*(F3-6)@}\) ist für kein \(x_1,x_2,x_3\) erfüllt.

Daraus folgt: Das LGS besitzt keine Lösung.

[[/lang]][[lang code="en"]]

Solution


(a)

\(\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@A@} & {@B2@}& {@C2@} & 1\\ 4& 5 & 6 & 1 \\{@D2@} & {@E@} & {@F@} &2 \end{array}\right) \xrightarrow{{@A@}II-4I, {@A@}III-{@D2@}I}\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@A@} & {@B2@}& {@C2@} & 1\\ 0& {@5*A-B2*4@} & {@6*A-4*C2@} & {@A-4@} \\0& {@E*A-B2*D2@} & {@F*A-D2*C2@} & {@2*A-D2@} \end{array}\right)\xrightarrow{{@5*A-B2*4@}III-({@E*A-B2*D2@})II}\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@A@} & {@B2@}& {@C2@} & 1\\ 0& {@5*A-B2*4@} & {@6*A-4*C2@} & {@A-4@} \\0& 0 & {@(F*A-D2*C2)*(5*A-B2*4)-(E*A-B2*D2)*(6*A-4*C2)@} & {@(5*A-B2*4)*(2*A-D2)-(E*A-B2*D2)*(A-4)@} \end{array}\right)\)


There is a free variable (for example \(x_3\)).

This follows: The LGS has infinitely many solutions.


(b)

\(\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@F@} & {@D2@}& {@C2@} & 1\\ 4& 5 & 6 & 1 \\{@B2@} & {@E@} & {@A@} &2 \end{array}\right) \xrightarrow{{@F@}II-4I, {@F@}III-{@B2@}I}\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@F@} & {@D2@}& {@C2@} & 1\\ 0& {@5*F-D2*4@} & {@6*F-4*C2@} & {@F-4@} \\0& {@E*F-D2*B2@} & {@F*A-B2*C2@} & {@2*F-B2@} \end{array}\right)\xrightarrow{{@5*F-D2*4@}III-({@E*F-B2*D2@})II}\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@F@} & {@D2@}& {@C2@} & 1\\ 0& {@5*F-D2*4@} & {@6*F-4*C2@} & {@F-4@} \\0& 0 & {@(F*A-B2*C2)*(5*F-D2*4)-(E*F-B2*D2)*(6*F-4*C2)@} & {@(5*F-D2*4)*(2*F-B2)-(E*F-B2*D2)*(F-4)@} \end{array}\right)\)

\(x_1,x_2,x_3\) can be clearly determined.

This follows: The LGS has exactly one solution.


(c)

\(\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@F3@} & {@E3@}& {@D3@} & 1\\ 6& 5 & 4 & 1 \\{@C3@} & {@B3@} & {@A3@} &2 \end{array}\right) \xrightarrow{{@F3@}II-6I, {@F3@}III-{@C3@}I}\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@F3@} & {@E3@}& {@D3@} & 1\\ 0& {@5*F3-E3*6@} & {@4*F3-6*D3@} & {@F3-6@} \\0& {@B3*F3-E3*C3@} & {@F3*A3-C3*D3@} & {@2*F3-C3@} \end{array}\right)\xrightarrow{{@5*F3-E3*6@}III-({@B3*F3-C3*E3@})II}\left(\begin{array}{ccc|c} {@F3@} & {@E3@}& {@D3@} & 1\\ 0& {@5*F3-E3*6@} & {@4*F3-6*D3@} & {@F3-6@} \\0& 0 & {@(F3*A3-C3*D3)*(5*F3-E3*6)-(B3*F3-C3*E3)*(4*F3-6*D3)@} & {@(5*F3-E3*6)*(2*F3-C3)-(B3*F3-C3*E3)*(F3-6)@} \end{array}\right)\)


III: \(0x_1+0x_2+0x_3={@(5*F3-E3*6)*(2*F3-C3)-(B3*F3-C3*E3)*(F3-6)@}\) is not \(x_1,x_2,x_3\) met.

This follows: the LGS has no solution.

[[/lang]]

prtcorrect.text: [[lang code="de"]]Richtige Antwort, gut gemacht![[/lang]][[lang code="en"]]Right answer, well done![[/lang]]

prtpartiallycorrect.text: [[lang code="de"]]Ihre Antwort ist teilweise korrekt.[[/lang]][[lang code="en"]]Your answer is partly correct.[[/lang]]
